QuestData.Title: Trident of the Son
QuestData.Description: <From the scratches he makes in the rock, you see several symbols: a trident, a mur'ghoul, the sun, a wrecked ship, and a rough stick-figure of yourself.>$B$B<Puzzling out what the murloc is conveying takes a while. Obviously he wants you to get a trident from the Chillmere Coast, but the image of the sun is puzzling. That is until you realize he means his son.>$B$B<His son was changed into a mur'ghoul! He wants you to find him to the south near the wrecked ship and return with his trident.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Old Icefin wants you to obtain Rotgill's Trident. Return it to him on the small island on the Chillmere Coast.
QuestData.CompletionText: <One of Old Icefin's dead fish-like eyes studies you, clearly looking for signs of his son's trident.>
QuestData.RewardText: <Reaching out to take his son's trident from you, Old Icefin's hand shakes a little. Could it be that the aged murloc is grieving?>$B$B<Is that just extra moisture pooling at the base of his eye?>
